titles.title: District of Columbia Budget Autonomy Act of 1998
To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to provide the District of Columbia with autonomy over its budgets.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on District of Columbia.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 6/11/1998--Introduced. District of Columbia Budget Autonomy Act of 1998 - Amends the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to provide that the District of Columbia Budget passed by the Council of the District of Columbia shall be enacted without referral to the President or approval by the Congress.
